Text: Well I'm sure I'm gonna love it cause its Miike but I hate buying movies before I get to watch them at least once. I refuse to watched censored anything.
As far as I know, there is no "uncensored" version of this movie. It is Japanese, and they are known for censoring out the bushy parts... if you know what I mean.

Miike seems to enjoy taking the piss out of the Japanese censorship laws, as much in this film as any of his others.  This is a brilliant, deeply disquieting and often monstrously funny film, and the concept of censorship hardly applies.  If you're looking for titillation you're looking at the wrong film.
Did a bit of research and there is NO uncensored version. It was never released. So either watch this or don't.
